00042 #ifndef _LUSTRE_MDS_H
00043 #define _LUSTRE_MDS_H
00044 
00050 #include <lustre_handles.h>
00051 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00052 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00053 #include <lustre_lib.h>
00054 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00055 #include <lustre_export.h>
00056 
00057 struct mds_group_info {
00058         struct obd_uuid *uuid;
00059         int group;
00060 };
00061 
00062 struct mds_capa_info {
00063         struct obd_uuid        *uuid;
00064         struct lustre_capa_key *capa;
00065 };
00066 
00067 #define MDD_OBD_NAME     "mdd_obd"
00068 #define MDD_OBD_UUID     "mdd_obd_uuid"
00069 
00070 static inline int md_should_create(__u64 flags)
00071 {
00072         return !(flags & MDS_OPEN_DELAY_CREATE) && (flags & FMODE_WRITE) &&
00073                !(flags & MDS_OPEN_LEASE);
00074 }
00075 
00078 #endif
